welcome.title: Welcome to Red Hat Genie
welcome.description: Harness the full potential of the hybrid cloud, simply by asking.

aiCommandCenter.label: AI Command Center
aiCommandCenter.title: Intelligence at your command
aiCommandCenter.description: Ask anything. Get answers. Troubleshoot, analyze, and understand your entire fleet just by asking. It's the power of your data, in plain language.

canvasMode.label: Canvas Mode
canvasMode.title: Go from conversation to clarity.
canvasMode.description: Transform answers into custom dashboards. In Canvas Mode, you can effortlessly arrange, customize, and build the precise view you need to monitor what matters most.

sharing.label: Sharing
sharing.title: Share your vision. Instantly.
sharing.description: An insight is only powerful when it's shared. Save any view to your library and share it with your team in a single click. Drive decisions, together.

privacy.title: Important privacy notice
privacy.description:
Project Genie is powered by generative AI. To protect your security, please do not include personal information or sensitive data (like secrets or API keys) in your conversations.

Your interactions may be used to improve Red Hat products and services.
privacy.linkText: Read the Red Hat Privacy Statement

notifications.emptyState.heading: No notifications
notifications.emptyState.description: You don’t have any notifications right now. New alerts and updates will appear here as they come in.
dashboard.emptyState.heading: Every dashboard tells a story. What will yours say, {{name}}?
dashboard.emptyState.headingNoName: Every dashboard tells a story. What will yours say?
dashboard.emptyState.description: Begin with Genie — transform your OpenShift data into insight, and insight into action.
